name: Field Kit FX
details: Modular Multi-Effects ProcessorThe Field Kit FX is a super versatile effects unit! It boasts a Frequency Shifter, Looper, Spring Reverb, Digital Delay, Bit Crusher, 4 Channel Mixer with VCA’s and tone control, a mini sequencer and ADSR, all under CV control! The Field Kit FX is more fun with the right tools! You could add the FX Expansion Pack, which offers a spring reverb tank and other goodies!
